description:
Bartolomeo and Otama look back on Luffy and the Straw Hat Crew`s adventures in the Land of Wano. Otama tells Bartolomeo about her meeting with Luffy, and the events leading up to the fierce battle with Kaido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Senpai Ouen Kikaku! Barto no Himitsu no Heya!
Unterstützungsprojekt für Meister Ruffy! – Bartos geheimes Kämmerchen!
Épisode spécial : Le jardin secret de Barto
ルフィ先輩応援企画! バルトの秘密の部屋!
